monsters.name: Evil Mage

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.text:
The mage is a 4th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as its spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13; +5 to hit with spell attacks). The mage knows the following spells from the wizard's spell list:
Cantrips (at will): light, mage hand, shocking grasp
1st level (4 slots): charm person, magic missile
2nd level (3 slots): hold person, misty step

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.  Hit: 3 (1d8-1) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.spells: light, mage hand, shocking grasp, charm person, magic missile, hold person, misty step

monsters.name: Mormesk the Wraith
monsters.damageResistances: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered
monsters.conditionImmunities: charmed, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.text: The wraith can move through an object or another creature, but can't stop there.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, the wraith has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 3) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. If this attack reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

monsters.name: Nezznar the Black Spider

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.text: Nezznar has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: Nezznar has disadvantage on attack rolls when he or his target is in sunlight.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.text:
Nezznar can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: dancing lights
1/day each: darkness, faerie fire (save DC 12)

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.text:
Nezznar is a 4th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13; +5 to hit with spell attacks). Nezznar has the following spells prepared from the wizard's spell list:
Cantrips (at will): mage hand, ray of frost, shocking grasp
1st level (4 slots): mage armor, magic missile, shield
2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, suggestion

actions.name: Spider Staff
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6-1) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

monsters.spells: mage hand, ray of frost, shocking grasp, mage armor, magic missile, shield, invisibility, suggestion, dancing lights, darkness, faerie fire

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The ruffian makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100 ft./400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.
